text: (napiyē!) Ovvoru tūtarum taṉ makkaḷukkut teḷivāka vivarittuk kūṟum poruṭṭu, antanta makkaḷiṉ moḻiyaik koṇṭē (pōtaṉai puriyumāṟu) nām avarkaḷai aṉuppivaittōm. (Antat tūtarkaḷ evvaḷavu muyaṟcitta pōtilum avarkaḷ ceyyum naṉmai tīmaikkut takkavāṟu) allāh nāṭiyavarkaḷai tavaṟāṉa vaḻiyil viṭṭuviṭukiṟāṉ. (Naṟceyalkaḷ ceyyum) avaṉ virumpukiṟavarkaḷai nērāṉa vaḻiyil celuttukiṟāṉ. Avaṉ aṉaittaiyum mikaittavaṉ, ñāṉamuṭaiyavaṉ āvāṉ
